# Portfolio Website Roadmap

## Overview

This document outlines the development roadmap for the portfolio website, organized into phases with clear milestones and deliverables.

---

I have completed a warmup exploration of this portfolio project. Here is a summary of what I found:

## Project Overview

This is a **Next.js 15 portfolio website** built with:
- **TypeScript** for type safety
- **Tailwind CSS** for styling
- **Framer Motion** for animations
- **MDX** for blog content
- **Jest + React Testing Library** for testing

## Project Structure

- `/src/app` - Next.js App Router pages (home, about, blog)
- `/src/components` - React components organized by feature (blog, home, layout, ui)
- `/src/hooks` - Custom hooks (useLikes)
- `/src/lib` - Utility functions (analytics, blog parsing, utils)
- `/src/providers` - Context providers (AnalyticsProvider)
- `/content/blog` - MDX blog posts
- `/public` - Static assets (images, fonts)

## Current State

The project is in **Phase 2** of development according to the ROADMAP. Recently completed features include:
- Blog post like system with analytics
- Social sharing buttons
- Comprehensive test suite

## Key Technologies

- Next.js 15 with App Router
- React 19
- Radix UI primitives
- Lucide icons
- Gray-matter for MDX frontmatter parsing

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/(default)/page.tsx` - Main home page entry point
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/lib/blog.ts` - Blog utility functions and content management
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/layout/Header.tsx` - Main navigation component
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/ROADMAP.md` - Project roadmap and feature planning
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/tailwind.config.ts` - Design system and theme configuration
